{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-AC68P.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1900 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC68UF/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC68 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = UF |revision = (v2) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = RT-AC68 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAC68UV2 |icid = 3568A-RTAC68UV2 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G200TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15F2G16128A-BDB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;brcmarm;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ASUS Router App, AiCloud support, AiMesh |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS 5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Asuswrt-Merlin
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/30/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00I7EM752 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|ASUS RT-AC68}}
<!--:<small>A tag line of ''802.11ac Concurrent Dual-band AC1900'' (600Mbps/2.4GHz*+1.3Gbps/5GHz) :within the [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/www/EN.dict ''ASUSWRT'' source applies] to the '''RT-AC68U, RT-AC68U v2, RT-AC69U'''.</small>-->
===Features=== *Airtime Fairness, Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control *Dual WAN, IPTV support, Roaming Assist, Guest Network (3x) *VPN server: IPSec Pass-Through, PPTP Pass-Through, :L2TP Pass-Through, PPTP Server, OpenVPN Server *VPN client: PPTP client, L2TP client, OpenVPN client *Mac OS Backup, Enhanced media server (AiPlayer App) :Image: jpeg, Audio: mp3, wma, wav, pcm, mp4, lpcm, ogg :Video: asf, avi, divx, mpeg, mpg, ts, vob, wmv, mkv, mov *AiCloud personal cloud service, 3G/4G data sharing *Printer Server: LPR protocol support :Multifunctional printer support (Windows only) *Download Master: Download scheduling :Support bt, nzb, http, ed2k :Support encryption, DHT, PEX and magnet link :Upload and download bandwidth control *AiDisk file server: Samba and FTP server :with account management
===FCC info=== The ''ASUS'' logo, "RT-AC68U-V2", "REV 3.00" and "HannStar KMV-4" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *'''CPU''': [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0KFEBG (@1.0GHz) *'''Flash''': ''Spansion'' S34ML01G200TFI00 (128MB) *'''RAM''': ''ESMT'' M15F2G16128A-BDB (256MB) *'''WLAN''': 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602KMLG (3T3R)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32609-asus-rt-ac68p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC68P Wireless-AC1900 Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=20297 ''ASUS RT-AC68P Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
==See also== *[[ASUS RT-AC68]] *'''ASUS RT-AC68UF''' {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC68UF/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC68P]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68P/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC68U]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68U/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900P]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900P/ Product Page] :(CPU Dual-Core @1.4 GHz)
